title: Salem Maritime National Historic Site: Professional Development
body: Professional Development        Teacher Workshops Apply now for Park for Every Classroom! PEC is a free engaging week-long professional development workshop for K-12 educators of all disciplines. PEC will be held August 3-7, 2015 at Salem Maritime National Historic Site in Salem, Massachusetts.  Click on "Learn More" to apply. All Teacher Workshops   Teacher Workshop    Park for Every Classroom 2015 Learn More
